introduction: With lovable characters and hilarious storylines, Zokie of Planet Ruby follows two best friends, one of whom is out of this world!In buddy comedy ZOKIE OF PLANET RUBY, quirky 10-year-old vlogger Ruby discovers her only video channel follower is a goofy tail-zapping space alien possessing magical powers from the planet Pudge named Zokie Sparkleby, and they quickly become best friends. Along with their friend Earl, a talking con-man squirrel, Ruby teaches Zokie about her version of Earth, while Zokie learns to control his unpredictable powers as they film their daily mishaps and adventures around the city.Creators: Brian Morante (_Penguins of Madagascar, Breadwinners, SpongeBob SquarePants_), Mike Geige (_3 Amigonauts, Winston Steinburger and Sir Dudley Ding Dong_)Executive Producers: Brian Morante, Colin Bohm, Laurie Elliot, Doug Murphy, Pam WestmanProduced by Nelvana for Nickelodeon
